page.title: 03THURSTON PARISH CHURCH
page.content:
A BRIEF DESCRIPTION
The church has stained glass windows. Each window tells a story. The walls are made of flint. The tower fell down in 1860.A man called Stiff saw it fall,but did not tell anybody because he thought they would say that he had done it. When you come through the front (south) door,you see more doors straight ahead in the opposite wall. They put doors there because they believed the devil could only walk in straight lines,so if he came in through one door,he would go straight out of the other.
